properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 3 at 7:37PM CST until January 5 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Sucarnoochee River At Livingston Affecting Sumter County.

.Rises along the Sucarnoochee River have been a little higher than
previously forecast...and a flood warning is now in effect for the
Sucarnoochee River at Livingston.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Sucarnoochee River At Livingston.
* from Saturday morning to Sunday evening...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 7:30 PM Friday the stage Was 17.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by tomorrow late morning and
continue to rise to near 18.2 feet by tomorrow evening. The river
will fall below flood stage by Sunday morning.
* Impact...At 18.0 feet...Flooding of farm lands around Livinsgton
occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
